column4: i installed ccsm and had cube desktop running and everything, i restarted my comp and now everything is back to normal what do i do?
svenstaro how do i mark it so it starts up with everything else?
rinaldi, thats the thing if i have the custom effects settings, when i click preferences nothing pops up. if i have it on extra, nothing happens, no wobbly windows ngor anythi
svenstaro how? i did alt+f2 and typed in compiz
svenstaro i have 7.10 compiz fusion comes with it

svenstaro, no i installed  ccsm and personalized the settings, restarted and noticed that all of my settings weren't apparent (no more cube desktop) and when i try to click on ccsm nothing ever pops up
so can you tell me exactly which packages did you install then
you didnt autostart compiz
try to manually start compiz first
which command did you use before? which guide did you follow to install it?
yes, so you didnt do anything actually?
uhm I didnt advise you to install anything, I think youre confusing me. Anyway, I'll get the command
as a normal user, please run compiz --replace
in X of course, in a normal terminal
without quotes: "compiz --replace"
well, did compiz activate?
that is strange indeed, hang on
try "sudo apt-get install compiz compizconfig-settings-manager "
type "metacity --replace"
Yes definately, tho you never should have to reinstall gutsy, a clean uninstallation of compiz should do the trick, type "sudo apt-get remove compiz --purge"
after that, install compiz again and hope
also check https://help.ubuntu.com/community/CompositeManager/CompizFusion
okay patrick sorry I couldnt help, good luck
